about_the_game:
*The full version of the game (sold separately) is required to use this content. If necessary, please install the latest software patch(es).

●Description
Equipment (Weapons & Armor) Gem Assortment
This complete set of gems can be used to obtain weapons and armor.
*The purchase of this product is limited to once per account. Please note that multiple purchases are not possible.

The following items are included:
-Unnamed Gem x20
-Sword Gem x10
-Katana Gem x10
-Heavy Weapon Gem x10
-Long Staff Gem x10
-Special Gem x10
-Staff Gem x10
-Bow Gem x10
-Shield Gem x10
-Hat Gem x10
-Helmet Gem x10
-Light Armor Gem x10
-Heavy Armor Gem x10
-Inner Gem x10
-Accessory Gem x10
--
Total gems: 160

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-2510E 3.1GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5-7300U 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Onboard

short_description: This complete set of gems can be used to obtain weapons and armor.
